盯.definition: to watch attentively; to fix one's attention on; to stare at; to gaze at

盯住.definition: to watch sb closely; to breathe down sb's neck; to mark (sports)

盯梢.definition: to follow sb; to tail; to shadow

盯牢.definition: to gaze intently at; to scrutinize

盯視.definition: to stare fixedly; to look concentratedly
